main event: Two witnesses observed a bright white sphere about 30-40 feet in diameter silently approaching from the northeast, descending to an estimated height of 500-700 feet, accelerating rapidly, and disappearing from view to the southeast in Hampton Bays, New York, on June 24, 1953.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for approximately 15 seconds by two witnesses.
The object was described as a bright white sphere with a significant size of 30-40 feet in diameter.
It approached silently and then rapidly descended before accelerating and disappearing to the southeast.
The report includes two black and white photographs, one showing a silhouetted tree against a cloudy sky, and the other showing a body of water with a partially submerged structure or object.
The UFO sighting took place in the evening at shortly after 10:00 P.M.
photographs: yes, the report includes two photographs
